plot: A CIA agent that works as an anti computer hacker is thrown into a case by a terrorist bent on destroying the United States. He is forced to go on the ground and face what might be the worst terrorist attack since 9/11.
plot_es: A CIA agent that works as an anti computer hacker is thrown into a case by a terrorist bent on destroying the United States. He is forced to go on the ground and face what might be the worst terrorist attack since 9/11.
plot_en: A CIA agent that works as an anti computer hacker is thrown into a case by a terrorist bent on destroying the United States. He is forced to go on the ground and face what might be the worst terrorist attack since 9/11.
